CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 19, 1958, pg. A15 reads: "Reception For Distinguished Guest - Some of the Allegheny County Democrats played the role of host at a reception held at the beautiful Terrace Hall Hotel, Sunday night, for the Hon. Andrew M. Bradley of Bedford, Secretary of Property and Supplies of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania. Mr. Bradley, surrounded by charm, is shown with Mmes. Gladys Coffey and Lonnie Stovall, left, and Frederick G. Weir and Anne Boyd, right. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of woman and five men, including K. Leroy Irvis second from left, and the Honorable Andrew M. Bradley third from right, standing behind buffet table in Terrace Hall Hotel for reception
